name: Spacer Rescue
description:
In a universe full of opportunity and fortune as a Spacer two things are true: Space is really dangerous and big and two always remember to get paid. Pay your debts and stay safe!

Controllers advised. (KBM is wonky and not easy).

Spacer Rescue is going to have a demo on August 23rd and Release on December 15, 2022. SoundCloud for the Album. (https://soundcloud.com/nick-hazrd/sets/spacer-rescue)

(8.15.22) An Alpha playground has been added for movement and shooting testing, give it a go! The enemies can fire but you are still the invincible hero with a powerful dash.
